ProductData.Long_Description: This blend of two Champagne grape varieties is a hallmark of the Bruno Michel estate. A fine, balanced wine with a touch of acidity, it has a subtle nose, which blends aromas of quince, apples and toast to charm wine professionals and wine lovers every year. It's a real Coup de Coeur. Mostly harvest 2010 (included 20% of reserve wines) Chardonnay 50% - Pinot meunier 50% 6 years on lies Dosage Brut (8g/l) Coup de coeur Guide des Champagnes Gault et Millau, 2016 Silver Medeal Challenge Millesime Bio, 2015 Two stars Guide Hachette des Vins 2016
